isParty: Do you represent a Party (national Government)?
organization: Organization or coalition (official name of the organization)
authorityDocumentsSection: Authority letter from head of the organization
authorityDocumentsDescription: Please upload any document that shows you have the authority to submit a commitment on behalf of your organization.
authorityDocumentsHelp: Simple letter listing the names and emails of the person within the organization that is authorized to use the online reporting tool to communicate commitments as per COP decisions 16/32 Annex II
authorizedEmailsHelp: Please provide the email addresses of the person(s) within the organization that is authorized to use the online reporting tool to communicate commitments as per COP decisions 16/32 Annex II. This list should match the information provided in the authority letter.
signUpInformation: Please ensure that all users associated with the provided email ID have registered for a CBD account. Users can sign up by visiting the following link
otherRelevantInformationInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant information that may not have been addressed elsewhere in the record.
otherRelevantWebsite: Other relevant website address or attached documents
submitCredentialSuccessMessage: Your credential to submit a commitment has been received by the Secretariat. You will be notified when your request has been accepted on the online reporting tool.
